main.name: Maria McGovern
main.description: leveraging a graphic design background to build a more intuitive user experience on the web
main.bio: My name is Maria, I'm a Full Stack Developer.  I'm passionate about providing unique perspectives on how end users interact with web applications by leveraging a background in marketing. With each project, my aim is to best engage my audience for an impactful user experience. In a recent project, I worked on a team of four to develop an app that allows elderly users to track their prescription, doctor and appointment information. Equipped with working collaboratively with a like-minded team to ensure optimal results for user-centered and technology-centered designs.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details or anything else.

projects.title: MedCheck
projects.category: An application intended for use on a mobile phone/iPad that allows users to track their prescription, doctor and appointment information built with AirBnb Linter, Bootstrap 4.0 React-strap, Postman, Toast, MongoDB and APIs.

projects.title: Travel Wishlist
projects.category: Created a travel planning app that allows a user to search a desired city they would like to visit, add it to a ‘travel wish list’ or an ‘already visited site’ built with Bootstrap CSS, Javascript, Node.js, CSS & HTML, mySQL Data, Heroku for Deployment, jQuery, Handlebars, ESLint/Google API Lint.

projects.title: Night In!
projects.category: An application to help recommend a movie and a recipe for a couple hoping to have a night in built with 2 APIs using Ajax calls and CSS framework, Foundation.
